outputs.output_descr: "Transforming the global aviation sector: Emission reduction from international aviation" is an initiative of UNDP and the International Civil Aviation (ICAO), aiming at reducing emissions, will identify the implementation needs of States relating to the reduction of international aviation emissions, and support them in the enhancement of national capacities for lowering carbon dioxide emissions from aviation.

project_descr: Transforming the global aviation sector: Emission reduction from international aviation.
project_title: Transforming the global aviation sector: ER from IA
